response.overview: The artist looks back at the passing of time and raises his camera to capture it. He looked back at the fragments of time that he had accumulated, and once again looked back at the time that had passed. The traces of time left on the film begin to move as light passes through them, some as memories, some as dreams. Even though not much time had passed, some of the things he wanted to recall became dreams, and some of the things that seemed like dreams remained clear in his mind. What did Goh recall and what did he dream of? It is not clear, but he embraces the past time and tries to finish the work of Dreams and Retropection of Go Taeyoung.
response.title: Dream and Retrospection of Go Taeyoung
